titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on Paraquat Dichloride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/8/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2006, the duty on Paraquat Dichloride (1,1'dimethyl-4,4'-bipyridinium dichloride). Provides for an increase in such duty on January 1, 2007, through December 31, 2007, and another increase on January 1, 2008, through December 31, 2008.
